Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the game where players participate and play against each other
See Also:

      Parameters:
      board - the board/scoreboard

      players - list of players

      commonObjective2 - common objective card

      objectiveDeck - the deck containing objective cards

    • isMarketEmpty

      public boolean isMarketEmpty()
      check the decks in the market so that when they are empty there will be at least 4 more cards to draw in the last round, triggered by this method
      Returns:
      true if the decks are empty, false otherwise
